page.title: 07GAMES IN RADSTOCK
page.content: Children in our area like playing cricket,football,rounders and netball in their spare time. Cricket is a game what can be played in summer.Football is a game which is mainly played in winter.The idea of the game is to kick a ball between two posts.Rounders is almost the same as cricket.For netball the idea is to score by throwing a ball into a net. The lastest craze is breakdance and B.M.X.Breakdance is a new style of dancing.B.M.X.'s are a new sort of bike that came over from America.They stand up to racing and freestyle. Freestyle is a lot of stunts,some are dangerous.There are freestyle and racing competitions held all over the World.
